name: SmilebotVA (Virtual assistant)
description:
This is Smilebot. You can talk to him, and hell give you answers.

He will not function until 12, 07, 2022. The only thing he'll say on startup is: "2022, 7, 1 is the current date in your time zone. This program will launch at 1272022" which means 12, 7 2022. 

Five days after launch, he will be a paid project and will cost: from $1.00 to $2.00.
